I’m traveling down to Florida for my nephews 50th birthday. I wanted something fun and vibrant so I went to Amazon for a retro bowling shirt. I’ve purchased actual bowling shirts from Amazon in the past being a big Two and Half Men fan and they were in $40-$50 dollar range. Obviously those shirts are two colored fabric stitched together and the fabric has some weight to it. When I can across these I didn’t know what to expect but for half the price I had a pretty good idea. I could tell they were not two different fabrics stitched together but more of print style just by the pictures, but decided to give them a try. Pleasantly surprised. I have broad shoulders so I always order 3x. They were a perfect fit. The length is perfect too. As others have stated they are very thin but for me in the Florida heat that’s a major plus. They are silky, light and comfortable and the colors are very vibrant. Had many compliments on them. I purchased two different styles and they were both exactly as pictured. Two thumbs up.

评论概述: Love the Flamingo on the pocket!
评论详情: This is my perfect summer shirt. It's light and cool and has a Flamingo on it. It fits very well. I wear between a 2X and 3X, and this is the perfect length, below my hips, and is loose enough not to feel binding. It may be a little snug on someone who is a true 3X. It does keep wrinkles if you don't get them out before hand. The material is mostly silky polyester, slick feeling. I really like the pink trim and the flamingo design is on the inside  of the pocket as well as the outside. I got a lot of great comments on my new shirt at lunch today.

评论概述: A shirt for the fashion bold
评论详情: The tackiest neo-Hawaiian shirt I own!  I'm wearing it to a party tomorrow.  This thing has "Christmas sweater ugly" nailed down for the summer. Thin polyester, garish colors, bold graphic. This is the shirt for the man who is not afraid to inflict himself on others. If you're going to dive into life, make it a cannonball.2 unabashed thumbs up.

评论概述: Fun and retro in the flamingo design;  easy machine wash/dry
评论详情: This is a review of the QIVICIMA Button Down Hawaiian Shirt.  My husband is a fan of Hawaiian shirts and flamingos, so we were eager to get this one in the flamingo design. Happy to say we like it a lot.  The shirt is a mix of polyester and spandex; it does feel thin but that’s not a problem for us - it is very lightweight and comfortable and perfect for summer.  My husband normally wears a large or XL, so we got this in the large and I am glad we did because if anything, it could almost be a little smaller. He would’ve been swimming in the XL. So if you are between sizes, I would go with the lower one.  This shirt is also so easy to machine wash and dry and the colors stayed vibrant and the shirt did not shrink. We take it out of the dryer and hang it up and there are no wrinkles.  Recommended.
10/10 its giving father figure

About what you would expect from a bowling shirt. Not quite "league" quality, but nice nevertheless. Runs a bit short at the waist in my opinion.  I will say the material attracts lint, so I found myself using a lint roller after wash/dry cycles.  A decent value overall. Would recommend.

Pros: + I ordered the XL and it fits really well. I have a 45" chest and a 47" belly. + The fabric is thin and silky-ish. + The shirt is sewn semi-well with no pulled seams and few loose threads. + It has some stretch to it. + The colors are bold! + The collar is thicker than the shirt fabric which is a huge plus for me.  Cons: - It's single stitched, which sucks. - It smells out of the package. - The buttons aren't sewn on terribly well. Threads are pulled when I undo the buttons.  ~~~RATING SYSTEM~~~  LEGEND + | These are positive comments about the product. - | These are negative comments about the product. = | These are neutral comments about the product. U | Updated information based on continued usage.  -----  Diamond's STAR RATING SYSTEM (What do my star ratings mean?): 1 STAR - Completely unusable, would request a refund 2 STAR - Meets minimum viable product requirements, wouldn't purchase it again 3 STAR - It does what it should, but in a non-spectacular way, I may recommend it, but definitely with reservations 4 STAR - I like it. It is solid quality and delivers as advertised, I would purchase it again and recommend it to a friend 5 STAR - I love it. It meets or exceeds all of my expectations and is high quality, I would purchase it again and would openly promote it to friends

评论概述: Nice shirt.  Cool and comfortable and the blue really pops!
评论详情: This is 95% Polyester and 5% Spandex.  It looks like polyester because it is.  But the item images don't do justice to the bright blue!I wore this all day at work yesterday and was very happy with it.  Cool and comfortable, and for as thin as it is, this polyester fabric seems very tough.I see the seller has most other variations of this shirt for $11.99 right now.  I'm resisting (for the moment) the urge to buy like 5-6 of them.  Very comfortable, fits and looks great, very pleased.
The pattern is good, the material is thin so maybe a good summer shirt. Fit as expected,  but took, for, ever to arrive.  So bear that in mind. That alone lowered my review.
This short looks great,  holds up to washing and colour is bright and lovely.The fabric is VERY thin,  men WILL need an undershirt.
Such a neat retro look! Great shirt, great for warm weather. And we’ve found that it’s a conversation starter - everybody asks where we bought the shirt! Heavy duty & comfortable fabric

Cool retro bowling shirt is lightweight and 95% polyester so it should keep it cool and dry. The shirt is not very well constructed with all seams being only single stitched. I'm not so sure how long this one will last. Then again I probably won't wear it that often. I feel the retro (Martin Sheen) look is kind of played out now. At this price point it is not a big worry. Very reasonable for what it is.
Stylish blast from the past.  This style of shirt was very common over a half century ago, I still own several.  Arrived on time, elated that it was a perfect fit, and no problems.

This is a nice shirt and the material feels nice on my skin wears really nicely. The sure has a silky field and is very light to wear so it would be nice to wear in the heat. The material feels a little thin, so I’m not sure how to hold up but other than that it’s a very nice shirt for the price I would recommend.

Yep, this is definitely a "Charlie Harper" style shirt. I immediately started hitting on random women and sipped beer on my deck overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Nah, in all honesty this shirt is very comfortable. It has some decent stretchability to it and it actually looks really good on me. The buttons and stitching are durable and this shirt feels like it is well constructed. It does look like something Charlie Harper from "Two And A Half Men" would wear, but it has not helped me in the lady department. Of course, I'm married, so I don't need it for that reason.

I like the retro look and style and the colors too. The brand had a couple of colors and styles to select from. To be honest I wanted to see how these would look on me after the style became popular from a certain sitcom I used to watch. The style was always interesting to me. The fabric is soft and silky smooth almost - likely a sports style material for wicking or helping stay cool. Soft on the skin and the fit and sizing was spot on - order your normal size. Looks good on me - and the wife likes the look on me too - Recommended

Just putting it on right out of the package, this shirt has a nice feel to it.  I almost felt like I wasn't wearing it.  It's lightweight, comfortable, and is true to size.  I like how the blue color fades light to dark.  It might be "retro" but is has a classy, classic look that can be worn in almost any setting.

This shirt was supposed to be a surprise for my husband, but unfortunately it does not fit him.  He can't even get the buttons buttoned.  He usually is a solid 2X so thats what I ordered.  He loves this style of shirt.  It does seem to be well made and the colors are great.  However this shirt is very heavy and would have been way to hot in the AZ sun.  So size did size not work and the weight of the fabric did not work.  If you were to order up a size, and live in a cooler climate, it might be ok.

This shirt fit as expected. It appears to be well made. I didn't find any loose stitching upon inspection. The buttons are well sewn. The material is light and comfortable. It has a very retro lol to it which is nice. It doesn't seem to wrinkle easily which is great. It has washed well so far.
